mission: Marvel Comics: TINY TITAN PANEL! Shamir ant-sized, speech bubble: 'Size matters NOT!' FLASHBACK PANELS: Underground fighter memories, Winter Soldier style! Musical chairs sequence: PM throne SWITCHING with Peres! SWAP! INTIFADA PANELS: Stones vs Tanks! David vs GOLIATH action! CLANG! Madrid Conference: Being DRAGGED to peace talks! 'NOOOO!' Bush Sr. looms as MEGA-THREAT! 'Your loans... GONE!' Immovable object panel: 'NOT ONE INCH!' meets unstoppable force! CRASH! Defeat panel: Votes scatter like dust. Final panel: 'Terror? I INVENTED it!' MIC DROP! BOOM!

input.hook: Size matters NOT!" screams the ant-sized titan.

output.optimized_script: Shamir, ant-sized, declared, 'Size matters not!'  Flashback: Underground fighting memories, brutal and swift, like the Winter Soldier.  A musical chairs sequence showed the Prime Minister's throne switching with Peres's; a dramatic swap!  Intifada panels flashed: stones against tanks, David versus Goliath; a clang of desperate conflict.  He was dragged to the Madrid Conference, a desperate plea escaping him, 'No!'  Bush Senior loomed, a mega-threat.  'Your loans... gone!'  An immovable object panel declared, 'Not one inch!'  It met an unstoppable force; a catastrophic crash.  Defeat: votes scattered like dust.  He declared, his voice booming, 'Terror? I invented it!'  A mic drop.  BOOM!

segments.text: Flashback: Underground fighting memories, brutal and swift, like the Winter Soldier.
A musical chairs sequence showed the Prime Minister's throne switching with Peres's; a dramatic swap!
Intifada panels flashed: stones against tanks, David versus Goliath; a clang of desperate conflict.
He was dragged to the Madrid Conference, a desperate plea escaping him, 'No!'
An immovable object panel declared, 'Not one inch!'
It met an unstoppable force; a catastrophic crash.
He declared, his voice booming, 'Terror? I invented it!'

The 'comic' style is the most direct and effective way to translate these elements visually. 'Vibrant' colors will enhance the energy and impact of these scenes, fitting for Instagram and a general audience.
